üöÄ Quick Start

Get started with the pre-built widget in just a few lines of code.

<script src="https://cdn.talktopc.com/agent-widget.js"></script> <script> TTPAgentSDK.AgentWidget.init({ agentId: 'your_agent_id', getSessionUrl: 'https://your-backend.com/api/get-session' }); </script>
Try Widget Demo

‚öõÔ∏è React Integration

Use the VoiceButton component in your React applications.

import { VoiceButton } from 'ttp-agent-sdk'; <VoiceButton websocketUrl="wss://speech.talktopc.com/ws/conv" agentId="your_agent_id" appId="your_app_id" />
View React Example

üåê Vanilla JavaScript

Integrate with any JavaScript framework or vanilla JS.

import { VoiceSDK } from 'ttp-agent-sdk'; const voiceSDK = new VoiceSDK({ websocketUrl: 'wss://speech.talktopc.com/ws/conv', agentId: 'your_agent_id', appId: 'your_app_id' }); await voiceSDK.connect();
Try Vanilla Demo
